name: Natural Lavender Grey Star Sapphire and Hand Made 14k Gold Ring- by Riordan Studio
description:
This is a gorgeous Natural Lavender Grey Star Sapphire with a dynamic star, I have tried to capture this in photos, it is so much more beautiful in person! Set in a hand made 14k Gold Ring with a matte finish. A very special ring!

To see this beauty in action and check out its mesmerizing star, follow this link to youtube:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yr3KiW88Aq0

Sapphire Specs:
Carat: 1.62 exact weight
Diameter: 8.0mm x 5.4mm
Depth: 3.2mm

Ring Specs:
Size 8
Could be sized up or down for a small fee, message me for details
From wrist to fingertip when worn is 9mm across
Rise above finger when worn is 4mm
Band width is 1.5mm
Total ring weight 1.74g



For more vintage engagement rings please click here:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/RiordanStudio?section_id=6875103

This diamond was graded (as always at RiordanStudio) by a GIA Graduate Gemologist and Accredited Jewelry Professional.

GIA’s color-grading scale for diamonds is the industry standard. The scale begins with the letter D, representing colorless, and continues with increasing presence of color to the letter Z, or near-colorless. Each letter grade has a clearly defined range of color appearance. Diamonds are color-graded by comparing them to stones of known color under controlled lighting and precise viewing conditions.

For more vintage jewels please check out RiordanStudio.etsy.com

name: Beautiful .73ct Rose Cut Diamond and .58ct Pink Diamond Earrings
description:
The beauty of rose cuts is that they have the appearance of being a much larger diamond than they really are. Having more surface area and a shallower depth, this cut allows for a *big* look and a dazzling sparkle without being bulky. These earrings are light and sparkly, the rose cut diamonds accentuated by their halo of beautiful fancy pink diamonds.

Center Diamond Specs (2 total):
Carat: .73 estimated weight
Color: H-I (near-colorless range)
Clarity: SI1-SI2 (Inclusions are noticeable to a skilled grader using 10× magnification)
Cut: Rose Cut

fancy Pink Side Diamonds Specs (11 each earring, 22 total):
Carat: .58 total estimated weight

GHIJ (near-colorless range)
KLM (faint yellow or brown range)
N-Z (very light yellow or brown to light yellow or brown range)

Clarity:
FL - (No inclusions or blemishes are visible to a skilled grader using 10× magnification)
IF - (No inclusions and only blemishes are visible to a skilled grader using 10× magnification)
VVS1 and VVS2 - (Inclusions are very difficult for a skilled grader to see under 10× magnification)
VS1 and VS2 - (Inclusions are somewhat visible under 10× magnification but can be characterized as minor)
SI1 and SI2 - (Inclusions are noticeable to a skilled grader using 10× magnification)
I1, I2, and I3 - (Inclusions are well seen under 10× magnification and may affect transparency and brilliance)

For more vintage engagement rings please click here:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/RiordanStudio?section_id=6875103

This diamond was graded (as always at RiordanStudio) by a GIA Graduate Gemologist and Accredited Jewelry Professional.

GIA’s color-grading scale for diamonds is the industry standard. The scale begins with the letter D, representing colorless, and continues with increasing presence of color to the letter Z, or near-colorless. Each letter grade has a clearly defined range of color appearance. Diamonds are color-graded by comparing them to stones of known color under controlled lighting and precise viewing conditions.
